iti29:2.1: “Dvihi, bhikkhave, dhammehi samannagato bhikkhu dittheva dhamme sukham viharati avighatam anupayasam aparilaham;
iti29:2.2: kayassa bheda param marana sugati patikankha.
iti29:2.4: Indriyesu guttadvarataya ca, bhojane mattannutaya ca.
iti29:2.5: Imehi kho, bhikkhave, dvihi dhammehi samannagato bhikkhu dittheva dhamme sukham viharati avighatam anupayasam aparilaham;
iti29:2.6: kayassa bheda param marana sugati patikankha”ti.
iti29:6.1: Ayampi attho vutto bhagavata, iti me sutanti.
